messages.title: Beyond Brexit
messages.content:
VOTE FOR JOHN POYNTON in EALING SOUTHALL in the GENERAL ELECTION on THURSDAY, 8th JUNE
UKIP today is probably the most inclusive and diverse political party in the country. We are a centre radical libertarian one-nation party that wants change. Our members come from all walks of life and ethnic backgrounds, united in the common objective of getting Britain out of the European Union. However now that the Referendum has been won, people are asking what's next for UKIP? First a full Brexit has to be delivered, but then it is important to understand that Brexit is only the gateway to our salvation. It all depends on how we use it.

The Tories won't do anything with Brexit and will fail to control immigration
Labour don't even want to leave the EU and do want mass immigration

Only UKIP will really deliver on Brexit
STAY WITH US – WE WILL HAVE TO PICK UP THE PIECES IN 2022.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Raise wages and narrow the income and regional gaps
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will raise wages and narrow the income and regional gaps.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Balance trade, migration and the budget, and hedge our national debt
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will balance trade, migration and the budget, and hedge our national debt.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: End austerity, reduce unemployment and restore our public services
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will end austerity, reduce unemployment and restore our public services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Introduce constitutional reform and proportional representation
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will introduce constitutional reform and proportional representation.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Champion small business and look after our veterans
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will champion small business and look after our veterans.
